FuncDef: This command configures the amount of time, in seconds, after a status change in the VPLS service during which traffic is flooded. When that time expires, traffic will be delivered according to the MMRP registrations that exist in the VPLS. When "no flood-time" is executed, flooding behavior is disabled.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MRP flood time, in seconds. Values-3 to 600.
